title: True Damage Ekko Appreciation Thread
body:
Legendary Skin Tier Check List

* New Model [✓]
* New Texture [✓]
* New Voice Lines [✓]
* New Animations [✓]
* New Visuals [✓]
* New Recall [✓]

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-lOga3yha2Is/Xbjub4bQGXI/AAAAAAABaiY/xCPYEohU4io1cKXOQ-VX441LypdgjJlfQCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/245019.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-FWD-Shzcn2I/XblBIeVbI-I/AAAAAAABavs/foeKWC_JDLIlY7L5fWp_b7T1OAaJFsEGwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkorecall.png

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-C_9NByuPpsw/Xbnq_WJxijI/AAAAAAABazg/yA-0feE-SiE0tUGukqC045M7a5_B8UDIgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkoemote.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-s9WqTWTa51s/Xbnq_bl3gqI/AAAAAAABazk/KLXbrWRrX6Y676svDFOy8Eq8xSlWvg6bACLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkoautopassive.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-HkLl6oxhkAE/XbnrAH3opmI/AAAAAAABazs/us3lvJ0DA4ssdeDTAxPhSEm2CyW3XxV_QCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkoq.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-5AOznBcqZPA/XbnrAyrVwOI/AAAAAAABaz0/DbrYbqCTdCUuyyc3BDUewGbVLVgmsG3NgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkow.jpg

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Br7tLOnQVLU/XbnrAKp3R4I/AAAAAAABazw/IHLb_IPorOscaDXyFsHhPtql5nYcd_plwCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkor.jpg

https://youtu.be/zwtwp7GYzqY

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0NrHiN_2uq8&t=3s (Credit to One Last Time)

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-_alx8OuIhUI/XcxhX2-81dI/AAAAAAABbRI/JGDRfUmZ8SsKdo52m5pFTokMK4n_x6gWgCLcBGAsYHQ/s1600/ekkoloadscreen_19_le.pie_c_9_23.jpg

True Damage Ekko Check List

* All of the things mentioned above [✓]
* Idle Jamming Animations [✓]
* Idle Rapping + Rapping when Moving [✓]
* Personal In-Game Music [✓]
* Ekko's Abilities changing the In-Game Music [✓]
* Saying Jokes in reverse [✓]
* Taunting enemies with Memes [✓]
* Every single Ability having a Visual or Sound Reference to Champion Theme or the Theme of the Skin that creates perfect consistency [✓]

Thank You Riot for this Quality Skin. You did Ekko real good.

replies.body: Thank you so much! It was an honor to write the VO for this one. My inner hip hop fanboy went all out.

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BdiN21ke,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2019-11-20T18:45:55.443+0000)
>
> Thank you so much! It was an honor to write the VO for this one. My inner hip hop fanboy went all out.

You and everyone else did a really good job. I'm proud of each and every single person who worked on this skin, from sound/visual/animation all the way to narration writing.

Why people downvoted you for that wtf

EDIT : The post was at -2 Before I commented.

> [{quoted}](name=Ahri Baka,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BdiN21ke,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-11-13T20:23:30.180+0000)
>
> Why people downvoted you for that wtf

Idk either I am hated here or people are just doing what they do best, hate, dislike, complain, etc...

> [{quoted}](name=BLIGHTBRINGER,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BdiN21ke,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-13T21:03:55.753+0000)
>
> Idk either I am hated here or people are just doing what they do best, hate, dislike, complain, etc...

I guess people are not used to appreciation threads , they only complain

There are some people in the community with very strong negative opinions about this skin so I'd honestly expect nothing less from them.

You're also praising Riot for something. Don't you know the community considers that to be illegal?

SUPA HEROOOOOOOOOOO
STATIC SHOCK
WOOP WOOP

And this is how you make a legendary be a legendary not just a 1350 with a new VO (looking at you SG Xayah/Rakan and Project Pyke). 

It's actually topped Dark Cosmic Jhin for my favourite legendary in the game and is probably my favourite skin bar none. totally no bias.

> [{quoted}](name=Infernape,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BdiN21ke,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-11-13T20:25:26.047+0000)
>
> And this is how you make a legendary be a legendary not just a 1350 with a new VO (looking at you SG Xayah/Rakan and Project Pyke). 
> 
> It's actually topped Dark Cosmic Jhin for my favourite legendary in the game and is probably my favourite skin bar none. totally no bias.

Seeing as you have the Chroma Bundle Icon, how well does it look in the Loading Screen? 

Any chance you could screenshot what it looks like? I'm on Holiday atm, and I don't have access to my PC right now.

cool, too bad i cant ever play him because autofill is r%%%%%ed

How does the profile icon circle cutout look like with that icon?

I was expecting a bit more of a difference but nvm. If they zoom the icon crop a tiny bit more where the white circle in the middle is maybe it would look a tad bit better.
This is a truly great skin!!
This legendary honestly seems closer to a ultimate skin than a legendary. It's in this weird inbetween that makes it a MUST buy. I already own it on all of my alts.
The skin's not really my thing but I do gotta admit they did good work on it. Maybe too good of work, his new movements make it hard to guess tf he's gonna do sometimes. {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
cringe voice lines
